DOC.brief_summary: The current study design test efficacy , safety tolerability LCP-AtorFen , combination atorvastatin fenofibrate .
DOC.brief_title: Study Atorvastatin/Fenofibrate ( LCP-AtorFen ) Combination Therapy Dyslipidemia
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , 12 week study 52-week open-label follow-up evaluate safety efficacy LCP-AtorFen ( combination atorvastatin fenofibrate ) treatment hyperlipidemia . After wash-out phase , eligible patient randomize 1:1:1 ratio either LCP-AtorFen , atorvastatin fenofibrate 12 week . After completion 12-week phase , eligible patient offer receive open-label LCP-AtorFen another 52 week .
DOC.criteria: 1 . A diagnosis dyslipidemia ( nonHDLC > 130 mg/dL Triglycerides > equal 150 mg/dL < equal 500 mg/dL ) . 2 . Subject may currently statin lipidlowering therapy must willing able washout 8 week fibrate highdose niacin , 6 week statin lowdose niacin per day , 4 week bile acid sequestrant , ezetimibe , > 1000 mg fish oil per day . 3 . Other inclusion criterion might apply 1 . TGs > 500 mg/dL . 2 . History coronary heart disease ( CHD ) , transient ischemic attack , stroke revascularization procedure six month prior . 3 . Presence aortic aneurysm resection aortic aneurysm within six month . 4 . Poorly control diabetes mellitus ( glycosylated hemoglobin > 8.0 % ) diabetes mellitus require insulin therapy . 5 . Known lipoprotein lipase impairment deficiency Apo CII deficiency familial dysbetalipoproteinemia . 6 . History pancreatitis . 7 . Known allergy sensitivity statins fibrates . 8 . Poorly control hypertension . 9 . Other exclusion criterion might apply .
